snippet: On a 2009 trip to visit his native Indonesia, Andri Tambunan learned that H.I.V./AIDS was devastating the indigenous Papuan community in the eastern provinces.
abstract: On a 2009 trip to visit his native Indonesia, Andri Tambunan learned that H.I.V./AIDS was devastating the indigenous Papuan community in the eastern provinces.

headline.main: Taking Photos, and Action, in Indonesia
